products.title: Zurich Voile Soft White Roman Blind
products.metadescription: It’s one thing when a voile has a beautiful stripe pattern; it’s another when it’s like this Zurich Voile Soft White roman blind - amazingly textured and delightfully soft to the touch.    This blind instantly cosies up a room, stopping your windows from feeling stark, but withou

products.title: Zurich Carbon
products.metadescription: Buy made to measure Zurich Carbon Rigid Vertical Blinds from SoEasy Blinds. Order quality Rigid Vertical Blinds online today at low prices with fast UK delivery
products.productdescription:
Min Width: 250mm Max Width: 4115mm
	Min Drop: 100mm Max Drop: 2913mm
	Fabric Composition: Rigid PVC
	Louvre Width: 89mm
	Guarantee: 12 Months
	Fittings: Included
	Controls: Cord control to open/close and beaded chrome chain to tilt louvres, or wand control to open/close and twist wand to tilt louvres.
	Stack: A choice of left, right or split.
	Louvres: Rigid vertical blinds are not supplied with bottom weights or stabilising chain nor are they required.
